meanings.sent1: She always gives unprejudiced feedback on our work.
meanings.sent2: The judge made an unprejudiced decision based on the evidence.
meanings.sent3: Even the cat seemed unprejudiced when it chose to sit on anyone's lap.
meanings.sent4: Her unprejudiced view of the world was like a clear mirror reflecting reality.
meanings.sent5: The unprejudiced sky welcomed all with its vast openness.

meanings.definition: Free from bias or preconceived opinions.
meanings.sent1: He approached the situation with an unprejudiced mind.
meanings.sent2: The journalist's reporting was unprejudiced and fair.
meanings.sent3: The unprejudiced toaster popped up the toast perfectly every time.
meanings.sent4: Her unprejudiced heart was a beacon of light in a world of darkness.
meanings.sent5: The unprejudiced forest welcomed all creatures without judgment.
